name: The cycle of color
description:
The cycle of color is a game developed during the Extra Credits Game Jam 3, 2019.

Simple, short, fun.

1. We chose to interpret the theme of Cycle as an action verb that guides the gameplay. You, as the player, have to cycle around the colors to match the incoming targets.

2.Extra public domain and Extra Walpole.

3. It doesn't include flashing lights, loud noises, or jumpscares; but it does include a lot of colors.

4. N/A.

5. robertobuelvas94@gmail.com
